name: Curve^3
description:
Curve^3

One Game A Month attempt for August 2015.

In a world where of infinite water where green and white spheres rule the world from the sky, only YOU, a somewhat glowy cube with the capability of leaping through the air in curves, can stop those cubes from existing. Leap through the sky and catch those harmless, innocent spheres, but make sure you have enough leap fuel, or you'll surely fall to your doom!
